TopicTitle: Extreme lag in VAB/SPH when using Scrapyard

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.12.3.3173 x64, Win10

Problem: Extreme lag in VAB/SPH after attaching pretty much any engine. Once I have an engine and fuel tank attached, when trying to attach any other part, the game gets extremely laggy. If I remove all the engines again, the game is perfectly fine again. No performance issues in flight. The problem didn't occur on a new game, only after quite some time in career. If I remove ScrapYard and OhScrap, the issue disappears, but if I remove only ohScrap and leave ScrapYard as is, then I still get the issue.

Mods installed:

Reproduction steps: in the problem description

 

Log:

In KSP.log, there's an enormous amount of duplicated log entries like:

Quote


[ERR 15:39:53.642] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part turboJet with id 4290232878

[ERR 15:39:53.645] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part turboJet with id 4290232878

[ERR 15:39:53.648] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part turboJet with id 4290232456

[ERR 15:39:53.651] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part turboJet with id 4290232456

[ERR 15:39:53.653] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part structuralWing4 with id 4290277240

[ERR 15:39:53.656] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part structuralWing4 with id 4290277240

[ERR 15:39:53.659] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part structuralWing4 with id 4290276308

[ERR 15:39:53.662] [FlowGraph]: Graph already contains item! Part structuralWing4 with id 4290276308

 

 

I could just remove ohScrap and ScrapYard, but I hate playing without them :|

 

Update: After I removed both scrapYard, and ohScrap (cleaning all folders completely), and then reinstalled them, it looks fine, but I expect the problem will come back after some time.

Edited April 18, 2022 by Piff_paff
